Module nl.han.yaeger
Package nl.han.yaeger.engine.scenes

Class DynamicScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.yaeger.engine.scenes.StaticScene
      • nl.han.yaeger.engine.scenes.DynamicScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Activatable, Clearable, DependencyInjector, Destroyable, nl.han.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.events.userinput.KeyListener, TileMapListProvider, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, EntityCollectionSupplier, EntitySpawnerListProvider, SupplierProvider, YaegerScene, TimerListProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SplashScene
    public abstract class DynamicScene
extends StaticScene
implements UpdateDelegator, TimerListProvider, EntitySpawnerListProvider
    Instantiate a new DynamicScene. A DynamicScene extends a StaticScene, but adds its own Gameloop.
